name: Outdated Apache HTTP Server
description: The web server is running Apache httpd 2.4.41, which contains known vulnerabilities. Several CVEs affect this version including potential remote code execution and denial of service vulnerabilities.
remediation:
- Disable remote administration access or restrict it to specific management IPs only
- Ensure strong, unique administrative credentials are in use
- Update router firmware to the latest version to patch known vulnerabilities
- Consider placing router management on a separate VLAN accessible only to administrators
impact: Unauthorized access to the router admin interface could allow an attacker to reconfigure network settings, intercept traffic, modify DNS settings, or use the router as a pivot point for further attacks.
